thread.section_title: Travelbird Beoordelingen | Beoordelingen van Travelbird | travelbird.be
thread.title: Mikhael Beersaerts

author: Mikhael Beersaerts
title: Mikhael Beersaerts
text: I had no experience with Travelbird, but received a very low budget trip in my mailbox and could not let the offer pass. The trip was really wel organised. They did what they said they would do (and beyond!). I say yes to Travelbird to anybody who asks if it's ok to book with them. All was well organised (in Africa!) With local crew. You don't find this type of professialism with big travel agency's. Furthermore, they let you have the feeling to blend in, not to be a 'standard' tourist.
